actions.committee: Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Legislative and Budget Process.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislative and Budget Process

official_title: To amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to protect Social Security beneficiaries against any reduction in benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Protection Act of 2003 - Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to make it out of order in the House of Representatives or the Senate to consider any legislation that would reduce Social Security benefits to Social Security beneficiaries.

titles.title: To amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to protect Social Security beneficiaries against any reduction in benefits.
